name: Spooky Heroes
summary: Play as a knight who tries to unveil the mystery behind the spooky events occurring lately : Undead rising at night, hordes of goblins, orcs, tritons, elves, yetis and heretics suddenly becoming hostile, monstrous creatures blocking the path of travelers... Enroll new heroes on the way, each with their own powers and way to play. Earn money by slaying monsters, completing quests or finding treasure chests and spent it in villages to buy items which will help you on your journey. Be careful at night as foul horrors will rise and block your path. Ride boats and dragons, explore underwater caves and travel in more unique locations in this 2D casual platform game.
